name: Ext_R4_ActivityDefinition_oRR
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ActivityDefinition.observationResultRequirement for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ActivityDefinition.observationResultRequirement from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: What observations must be produced by this action
element.definition: Defines the observations that are expected to be produced by the action.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.observationResultRequirement` maps to R5 `ActivityDefinition.observationResultRequirement`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
